QuestData.Title: Featherfeet's Fun Falling's Fun Fee!
QuestData.Description:
Welcome to Zuldazar, my fine $pr friend!
I've explored every inch of this wonderful city with my own two feet. And let me tell you, they're tired!
That's why I've decided to provide a service to my powerful friends in the Horde: Featherfeet's Fun Falling!
Now, I know what you're thinking. You nomrally associate falling with screams, pain, and an untimely death.
BUT NOT WITH FEATHERFEET!
For a small one-time fee, I'll make sure you always float down this ziggurat shrouded in safety and fun.
QuestData.LogDescription: Pay 100 gold to Quinsy Featherfeet and he'll cast Slow Fall on you whenever you're nearby.
